title: Rspack build executor
description: Run Rspack via an executor for a project.

target.description: The platform to target (e.g. web, node).

outputPath.description: The output path for the bundle.

tsConfig.description: The tsconfig file to build the project.

skipTypeChecking.description: Skip the type checking. Default is `false`.

index.description: HTML File which will be contain the application.

baseHref.description: Base url for the application being built.

deployUrl.description: URL where the application will be deployed.

rspackConfig.description: The path to the rspack config file.

optimization.description: Enables optimization of the build output.

scripts.description: Enables optimization of the scripts output.

styles.description: Enables optimization of the styles output.

sourceMap.description: Output sourcemaps. Use 'hidden' for use with error reporting tools without generating sourcemap comment.

extractLicenses.description: Extract all licenses in a separate file.

fileReplacements.description: Replace files with other files in the build.

mode.description: Mode to run the build in.

generatePackageJson.description: Generates a `package.json` and pruned lock file with the project's `node_module` dependencies populated for installing in a container. If a `package.json` exists in the project's directory, it will be reused with dependencies populated.

entryName.description: Name of the additional entry file.

entryPath.description: Path to the additional entry file.

buildLibsFromSource.description: Read buildable libraries from source instead of building them separately. If set to `false`, the `tsConfig` option must also be set to remap paths.

externalDependencies.description: Dependencies to keep external to the bundle. (`all` (default), `none`, or an array of module names)

generateIndexHtml.description: Generates `index.html` file to the output path. This can be turned off if using a webpack plugin to generate HTML such as `html-webpack-plugin`.

memoryLimit.description: Memory limit for type checking service process in `MB`.

namedChunks.description: Names the produced bundles according to their entry file.

outputHashing.description: Define the output filename cache-busting hashing mode.

poll.description: Enable and define the file watching poll time period.

postcssConfig.description: Set a path to PostCSS config that applies to the app and all libs. Defaults to `undefined`, which auto-detects postcss.config.js files in each `app`/`lib` directory.

progress.description: Log progress to the console while building.

publicPath.description: Set a public path for assets resources with absolute paths.

rebaseRootRelative.description: Whether to rebase absolute path for assets in postcss cli resources.

runtimeChunk.description: Use a separate bundle containing the runtime.

scripts.description: External Scripts which will be included before the main application entry.

standardRspackConfigFunction.description: Set to true if the rspack config exports a standard rspack function, not an Nx-specific one. See: https://rspack.dev/config/

statsJson.description: Generates a 'stats.json' file which can be analyzed using tools such as: 'webpack-bundle-analyzer' See: https://rspack.dev/guide/optimization/analysis

stylePreprocessorOptions.description: Options to pass to style preprocessors.

includePaths.description: Paths to include. Paths will be resolved to project root.

styles.description: External Styles which will be included with the application

transformers.description: List of TypeScript Compiler Transfomers Plugins.

vendorChunk.description: Use a separate bundle containing only vendor libraries.

input.description: The input directory path in which to apply 'glob'. Defaults to the project root.

ignore.description: An array of globs to ignore.

bundleName.description: The bundle name for this extra entry point.

inject.description: If the bundle will be referenced in the HTML file.
